column1: We made it! Let's rock, Joker!
How d'ya like this? Aaand-a boop.
It's been a while, hasn't it?
And we're back in action with a new heart in our sights!

A wicked witch who treats people like toys.
Alice Hiiragi!

You pretend you're a ray of light, but all you do is
hurt people to indulge your own darkness.
You're a bad person, and bad people have to be stopped.
And all those Desires you stole?
Tonight, we're taking them all back!
And now, I'm going to make you mine...
Once again, the domain reflects who's within...
I'm sick and tired of everyone looking down on me...
Yes... The time has come for my true power.
You wretches shall witness... my final form!
Honestly... They're all in my way...
You've made me so very hungry...
It's dinnertime... and the main course is YOU!
Looks like you've been doing fine.
Whoa! What happened to you guys!?
Not just me. You changed too.
It looks like this place is connected to the Metaverse.
Aren't those the guys we saw at 705?
Hey, everyone. You love me, don't you?
Then you can give me all your Desires!
Whoa, what the hell was that!?
There's no time. We'll figure it out later!
Joker, Skull—let's fight our way out!
You sure you kids gonna be okay on your own?
We'll be fiiine! I mean, probably.
Eh, same to you. Be careful out there.
Is this the lab? It's kind of eerie...

Bad vibes here, guys...
This place looks straight-up haunted...

I'msosorryI'msosorry... Where are you, Sis!?
I'msosorryI'msosorry...
Uh, wait... I didn't know you two were...
Uh... Oh, no no no no! We're just friends!
They can't be far! Find them!
We have to punish them for defiling hallowed ground!
We'll make an offering out of them!
Maybe... But you know this case isn't solved yet.
Welcome, Phantom Thieves... to my own Jail!
Get down already or they're gonna see you!
Do you finally see the truth?
Do you know the true face of the guilty?

They condemn the good to slavery.
Pretend they do not see their agony.
Now, show your gaolers that you will wear a different chain.
I am thou, thou art I...
If you yet seek true justice, we will see it done!
I know what I have to do now...
Condemn the evil, and hunt them down!
The real Phantom Thieves... would never hurt me...
The real Phantom Thieves... are my friends!
Please! If you're my Phantom Thieves... then change their hearts!
Yeah, figures it'd be another crazy one...
I'd say we just found Konoe's castle.
Only one job left, team: bring the villain to justice.
So... I just talk into this?
You're on, man, just say it!
Toying with innocent lives, slandering us...
You've been busy. But so have we.
Ready or not, here we come!
To the villain who thinks he's a hero: Akira Konoe!
You stole the Desires of countless people...
And tonight, we're baking them— uh, I mean, taking them—
There aren't any real heroes left.
So... why not make our own?
The world needs someone willing to fight for its people's justice.
A hero to lead them. To unify them.
And if I'm the hero... that makes YOU the villain!
So we gotta put him down one last time!
Very soon, a deity will descend to this Earth.

And if you're gonna get in the way, well,
I gotta put you down. Them's the breaks!
It's kind of over your head, Sophia...
The little failure that you are.
So you know who I really am?
Maybe this will give you a clue.
The hell are you doing, Sophie!?
I was the one who designed her as EMMA's prototype.
She'll do anything I tell her to.
Cool, right? It really is gorgeous.

Sorry it had to end like this, but...
Well. What can you do?
I want my own... So please...

I want a heart... strong enough to choose...
my own path!

Dare you unleash catastrophe upon this world?
Can you cling to the paltry hope that remains?

Is the puppet ready to cut her own strings?
Shall the doll seize her own destiny?
Then you need only call my name.
I am thou, thou art I.

Your desires have been twisted...
and I'll be the one to take them.
You know the logo by now, right?
And we've got a big announcement for everybody!
Our target this time... is you!

You've all been made sheep. A mechanical god has usurped
what self you had... and you let it happen.

Do you really want someone telling you
what your own life is about?

All of you have paths only you can take...
but you make your own choices to get there!

That's why we're here.
We're going to snap you out of this!
You don't owe this dumb god your Desires!
The Phantom Thieves are taking them back!

I am the guiding god sought by mankind...
The Demiurge.
I exist... to answer all of your desires.
Oh man! The water's so clear!
Whoa. Well, it's some detailed work...
Get back here! You're all under arrest!
Oh, good... We didn't miss it!
Perfect timing! I think it's about to start—
Yes. A perfect scene of summer.
Um, can I see them too?
I promise: I won't forget you, or our time together.
And in politics, another massive scandal:
Legislator Jyun Owada has just been taken into police custody
after being connected to a hit-and-run,
as well as several counts of bribery...
It's about time we got going, too, huh?
So we'll go our separate ways, once more?
It's a little sad. Saying goodbye, I mean.

Come on, it's never goodbye forever!
We'll be back in a flash!
Whoa... There's a lot of them.
